other_title: Ani Tore!! XX: Hitotsu Yane no Shita de (Japanese)
あにトレ!!XX～ひとつ屋根の下で～ (Japanese)
plot: New member Sakura Izumi joins the five idol candidates of the previous season. A second year middle schooler, she often wears a big smile on her face.
opening_theme: "Cheer for You" by Miku Itō, Azumi Waki, Eri Suzuki, Kanon Takao, Maria Naganawa, & Miyu Komaki
